entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Question: why not add `IsTestProject` to project property when create a test project? #3790
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable SingleFile and Trimming analyzers when Publishing a NativeAOT app #25278
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25274
    Area-Infrastructure
